flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: So excited this year to finally use my Pan American World Airways bag that I found at a thrift store 5 years ago.
guide.introduction_rendered: So excited this year to finally use my Pan American World Airways bag that I found at a thrift store 5 years ago.
guide.summary: My Halloween costume is an inspiration from the Pan Am TV series that aired in early September. It was very easy to make from a standard pattern I purchased at a fabric store or you can transform a blue suit to get the look.
guide.time_required: 2 hours to sew the jacket and the skirt
guide.title: Pan Am Costume
